def_cn: （艺术家、运动员等）被埋没的，怀才未遇的
def_en: If you describe an artist or sports player as unheralded, you mean that people have not recognized their talent or ability.

def_cn: 出乎意料的；毫无先兆的
def_en: If you describe something that happens as unheralded, you mean that you did not expect it, because nobody mentioned it beforehand.
